meanings.definition: Control exerted to do something or restrain impulses.
meanings.sent1: She used her willpower to resist eating the tempting chocolate cake.
meanings.sent2: His willpower helped him stay focused on his goals despite distractions.
meanings.sent3: With great willpower, she resisted the urge to hit the snooze button.
meanings.sent4: Her willpower was like a shield against the distractions around her.
meanings.sent5: The strength of her willpower was evident in her unwavering determination.

meanings.definition: Determination to do something despite difficulties or obstacles.
meanings.sent1: His willpower to succeed in the face of challenges was inspiring.
meanings.sent2: She showed incredible willpower in completing the marathon despite the pain.
meanings.sent3: Even the rain couldn't dampen his willpower to finish the race.
meanings.sent4: Her willpower was a beacon of light guiding her through the tough times.
meanings.sent5: The sheer force of his willpower propelled him towards his goals.
